dict.string:
# JavaScript bundle additions using ApLo:
## Syntax Checker using JSLint: https://github.com/douglascrockford/JSLint
Use `APLO_JSLINT_OPTIONS` in a .tm_properties file to set the options for JSLint. Example (the default):
APLO_JSLINT_OPTIONS="devel: true, browser: true, white: true, onevar: true, undef: true, newcap: true, nomen: true, regexp: true, plusplus: true, bitwise: true, maxerr: 50, indent: 4"
See <http://www.JSLint.com/lint.html#options> for available options.
